about_text:
Welcome to Energy System Planner, the ultimate interactive platform for students eager to learn about electricity supply, power generation, and energy consumption!

Our mission is to provide an engaging and educational experience that helps students understand the challenges of supplying electricity efficiently, sustainably, and reliably. Whether it's powering a single home or an entire country, energy management requires careful planning and a deep understanding of different power sources.

The world is transitioning to cleaner energy sources, and future engineers, policymakers, and scientists need to be prepared to tackle energy challenges. By experimenting with different energy scenarios on our platform, youâ€™ll gain insights into real-world.

Whether you're a student, teacher, or just someone curious about how electricity powers the world, PowerGrid Planner is your gateway to understanding the future of energy. Dive in, experiment, and become a master of electricity supply!
